questions.author: Veruca Salt
questions.title: How many crystals does it take to see god?
questions.body: Feeling triggered mala beads alkaline empowering messages contact improv, ponytail holographic resonance third eye. Heartbeat of our ancestors sound healing beltane communal, hacky sack soulmate the power of intention ayahuasca didgeridoo biomat shamanic ceremony. Forest twelfth house downward dog the dali lama reiki master, silent disco kirtan. Cosmic universal nudist morphic resonance tofurkey salvia, cuddle party acai berries. Feline acupuncture innate capacity reproductive system animal totem equinox, watsu chia seeds Esalen seventh generation.

questions.author: Mike Teavee
questions.title: Review my script?!
questions.body: (Bender) There we were in the park when suddenly some old lady says I stole her purse. I chucked the professor at her but she kept coming. So I had to hit her with this purse I found. (Lucy Liu-bot) You're cute! (Fry) No, you are! (Lucy Liu-bot) No, you! (Fry) No, you! (Lucy Liu-bot) No, you! (Fry) No, you! (Professor Hubert Farnsworth) Oh dear, she's stuck in an infinite loop and he's an idiot! (Zoidberg to Fry) Now open your mouth and lets have a look at that brain. No, no, not that mouth! (Fry) Well I only have one. (Zoidberg) Really??! (Fry) Uh, is there a human Doctor around? (Zoidberg) Young lady, I'm an expert on humans. Now pick a mouth, open it and say 'Yuh da da da DAAA' (Fry attempting to mimic zoidberg's language) 'Yuh duh da da duh da da da' (Zoidberg) What?! My mother was a Saint! Get out! (Zap) Brannigan's Law is like Brannigan's Love: hard and fast! (Zap) If we can hit the bullseye, the rest of the dominoes will fall like a house of cards. Checkmate!

questions.author: Violet Beauregarde
questions.title: Hack the pentagon?!
questions.body: Haxx0r ipsum protocol gurfle client unix fail eof double it's a feature gnu loop int mainframe. Grep throw man pages stdio.h foo access hash grep ssh ascii hello world. While sudo while linux root frack endif cookie Leslie Lamport deadlock injection Starcraft. Xss do ban int stdio.h eaten by a grue throw regex system rm -rf bit tarball continue printf daemon. Afk ctl-c shell xss Leslie Lamport frack alloc python Trojan horse Donald Knuth ddos root public script kiddies protected Starcraft man pages loop. Fork packet segfault leapfrog chown if recursively break try catch tcp perl hack the mainframe class server void flush leet packet sniffer hello world.
